admin/editor.sandbox.title: Sandbox
admin/editor.sandbox.description: A sandbox component that renders HTML content inside a secure iframe
admin/editor.sandbox.initialContent.desc: Any valid HTML. May include scripts. The props passed to this block are available in `window.props`.

admin/editor.sandbox.height.title: Height
admin/editor.sandbox.allowCookies.title: Allow cookies
admin/editor.sandbox.allowCookies.descri: Allow scripts in iframe to read and write cookies
